title: 2020년 Green 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Green. 판결일: 2020-10-07. 법원: United States Court of Federal Claims.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Green v. Secretary of Health and Human Services
**판결일**: 2020-10-07
**법원**: United States Court of Federal Claims
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Thomas L. Gowen


## 판결문 요약

              In the United States Court of Federal Claims
                                    OFFICE OF SPECIAL MASTERS
                                        Filed: September 16, 2020

*   *    *    *   *    *   *    *   *    *    *   *    *
MELVIN GREEN,                                          *                 UNPUBLISHED
                                                       *
                           Petitioner,                 *                 No. 18-1343V
                                                       *
         v.                                            *                 Special Master Gowen
                                                       *
SECRETARY OF HEALTH                                    *                 Motion for Decision Dismissing
AND HUMAN SERVICES,                                    *                 Claim; Pneumococcal (Prevnar 13);
                                                       *                 Specific Antibody Deficiency
                           Respondent.                 *                 (SAD); Chronic Pansinusitis.
*   *    *    *   *    *   * * * *            *   *    *

Kelly D. Burdette, Burdette Law PLLC, North Bend, WA, for petitioner.
Darryl P. Wishard, U.S. Department of Justice, Washington, DC, for respondent.

                                                   DECISION1

        On August 31, 2018, Melvin Green (“petitioner”) filed a petition in the National Vaccine
Injury Compensation Program.2 Petitio...
